channel.title: GoodTimes 718 ECO/PK
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/ad.png[/img] GoodTimes is a Runescape Private Server with 2 Game Modes which are the PK Mode and the Economy Mode. [img]http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140804045038/runescape/images/4/4a/Skull.png[/img] While playing PK mode, you are able to spawn the common items, but you will not be able to interact physically with Economy players, meaning that you can't fight monsters, can't trade Economy players, and the items dropped by a Pker cannot be seen by an Economy player. [img]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa156/Crazykid1321/totalicon.png[/img] While playing Economy mode, you will have to choose 1 of the 4 these options:[center][img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/gamemodes.png[/img][/center] Meaning the highest XP you choose the lowest are the Drop rates.
[B]GoodTimes Features[/B] - 15+ PvM bosses - 20+ Minigames including new Minigames such as Dark Invasion - All 25 skills working including Dungeoneering and Construction - Great Combat Formula - 10 different Slayer Masters - The Grand Exchange player based And much more [B][SIZE=6][color=#FF0000]Links[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/forum.php]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][URL=http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/GoodTimes.jar]GoodTimes Launcher[/URL] [COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=6][B]Media[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][/center] [spoiler=Big Pics :3] [b][center]Our home[/b] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/home.png[/img] [b]Grand Exchange Player based Fixed search lag[/b] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/ge1.png[/img] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/ge2.png[/img] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/ge3.png[/img] [b]PvM/Custom bosses[/b][/center] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/queenblackdragon.png[/img] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/nex.png[/img] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/blink.png[/img] [center][b]Random boss events [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/giants.png[/img] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/mages.png[/img] The Donator Zone[/center][/b] [img]http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/images/advert/dz.png[/img][/spoiler]
I made this server because i miss having a community, and i hope that one day we will have a great community. Also i will try to keep adding new content.
-Nando

item.title: GoodTimes 718 ECO/PK
item.dc:creator: @Overhated Overhated
item.description:
@Overhated wrote:

[CENTER]
GoodTimes is a Runescape Private Server with 2 Game Modes which are the PK Mode and the Economy Mode.

While playing PK mode, you are able to spawn the common items, but you will not be able to interact physically with Economy players, meaning that you can’t fight monsters, can’t trade Economy players, and the items dropped by a Pker cannot be seen by an Economy player.

While playing Economy mode, you will have to choose 1 of the 4 these options:[center][/center]
Meaning the highest XP you choose the lowest are the Drop rates.

[B]GoodTimes Features[/B]

  • 15+ PvM bosses
  • 20+ Minigames including new Minigames such as Dark Invasion
  • All 25 skills working including Dungeoneering and Construction
  • Great Combat Formula
  • 10 different Slayer Masters
  • The Grand Exchange player based
    And much more
    [B][SIZE=6][color=#FF0000]Links[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
    [URL=http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/forum.php]Forums[/URL]
    [URL=http://goodtimes718.cu.cc/GoodTimes.jar]GoodTimes Launcher[/URL]
    [COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=6][B]Media[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][/center]
    [spoiler=Big Pics :3]
    [center]Our home

    Grand Exchange Player based Fixed search lag



    PvM/Custom bosses[/center]



    [center]Random boss events


    The Donator Zone[/center]
    [/spoiler]

I made this server because i miss having a community, and i hope that one day we will have a great community. Also i will try to keep adding new content.

-Nando
